title: My mystery champion happens to be the one champion I never wanted to buy

replies.body:
It's a champion you don't have to play if you don't want to and you didn't spend any ip so stop complaining. 

Your reasoning behind not wanting her must be pretty damn good if you want her removed so badly.

I hate her joke, I don't like her kit (even if it's good), don't like her character, don't like pretty much everything about her.
Oh, so you know how a few people pick a champion they never buy? Yeah, they usually pick Teemo. I picked Janna. Really not enjoying her presence.
I still have yet to recieve mine ;_;
